title: The following example creates a
FileSystemWatcher
c
to watch the directory specified at run time. The component is set to watch for changes in
LastWrite
b
and
LastAccess
b

time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console.

inline_content.Text: to watch the directory specified at run time. The component is set to watch for changes in

time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console.

title: Use the System.Diagnostics and System.IO namespaces for this example.

inline_content.Text: Use the System.Diagnostics and System.IO namespaces for this example.
